description: Number of subgroups of index n in fundamental group of a certain fiber space.
references: V. A. Liskovets and A. Mednykh, Enumeration of subgroups in the fundamental groups of orientable circle bundles over surfaces, Commun. in Algebra, 28, No. 4 (2000), 1717-1738.
R. P. Stanley, Enumerative Combinatorics, Cambridge, Vol. 2, 1999; see Problem 5.13(c), Eq. (5.125).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
